summary: Adds a standalone craftable light version of the Wolf Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Made this quick mod since I couldn\'t find any that did just that.

This will add a standalone (no replacers) Light version of the Wolf Armor, craftable at any forge under Steel. Fully upgradeable, will work with all Light Armor perks.

The set uses the same model and textures as the default Wolf armour, and will also use any replacer textures/meshes added to it.

Armor ratings are the same as steel to match the melee combat focus of the companions, while weight is one point over Leather per piece.
author: VonBarb
